Thank you for this show (and many others!)
Great job Great show very real However it is season 3. Thx for all the great shows and extremely fast load times.
No its season 1. Blood and Sand = Season 1. Gods of the arena = Prequel to season 1. This is the real season 2.

Watched the first part of season 2 and it was ok but  without Andy Whitfield who sadly passed away you can't possibly expect it to be as good. The man was simply perfect for the part 

However I will continue to watch so thanks ettv.

Andy was a great actor for the part but both him and the new actor are so small. Spartacus was a huge man like Oenomaus.

Also the revenge part kind of throws me a bit. Slavery is not a natural human condition so slaves tend to revolt if not held in place by massive violence and threat. Spartacus and the others revolted because they desired freedom not because of any particular dominus.

Awesome show but Season 1 is still top dog in the series!

thanks mate 

Andy Whitfield the first spartacus died 11 September 2011 at the age of 39
Sydney, Australia

from non-Hodgkin lymphoma

feel so sorry ....
